title: Quarkus Roq Frontmatter Schema
description: JSON Schema for YAML frontmatter in Quarkus Roq static site generator documents

layout.description: The layout template to use for rendering this page. Use ':theme/' prefix to reference theme layouts (e.g., ':theme/post', ':theme/page')

title.description: The title of the page or blog post

description.description: A brief description of the page content. Used for SEO and social media sharing

date.description: Publication date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd[ HH:mm][:ss][ Z] (e.g., '2025-02-05' or '2025-02-05 14:30:00')

author.description: Name of the content author. Accessible via {page.data.author} in templates

tags.description: Tags or keywords associated with this content. Used with the Roq tagging plugin to generate tag pages

draft.description: Mark this content as a draft. Drafts are hidden unless site.draft=true is set (typically in dev mode)

image.description: Path to the cover image for this page. Accessible via {page.image} in templates. Can be relative to page directory for index pages, or from the public/images/ directory

img.description: Alias for 'image'. Path to the cover image for this page

link.description: Custom URL path for this page. Supports placeholders like :path, :slug, :name, :year, :month, :day, :collection, :page. Default for pages: '/:path:ext'. Default for documents: '/:collection/:slug/'

slug.description: Custom slug for the URL. Used in :slug placeholder in link template. Auto-generated from title if not specified

escape.description: When true, the page content will not be parsed by Qute. Useful for content that contains Qute-like syntax that shouldn't be processed

oneOf.description: Name of the collection to paginate (e.g., 'posts')

collection.description: Name of the collection to paginate

link.description: URL template for paginated pages. Use :page placeholder for page number

paginate.description: Enable pagination for a collection. Use string for collection name, or object for advanced configuration

locale.description: Language/locale code for this content (e.g., 'en', 'fr', 'de'). Used for internationalization
